sentence: Along with one other Original Six indoor ice hockey arena, the Boston Garden, the Montreal Forum used a high-pitched siren to signal the end of an NHL game's period - the siren would later be re-installed in the Forum's successor facility, the Bell Centre (and still in use there), much as the TD Garden in Boston inherited the lower-pitched Garden's siren.

positive_examples.sentence: ...as a nomination for tony award for best original score...
positive_examples.entity: Tony Award for Best Original Score

positive_examples.sentence: ...album for american idiot the original broadway cast recording...
...for best director and academy award for best original screenplay...
positive_examples.entity: Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay
